name: Star Guardian Tower
description:
Introduction

The game is about a brave heroine stuck in a never ending tower.

It is a rogue like (so it is randomly generated, and you lose every items that you find when you die, not that there are any items to lose in this version).

This is for the search for a star game jam, but I will most likely continue to develop it.

!Note

Sometimes the projectiles don't despawn properly and I didn't have time to fix them so... apologies in advance.

Controls:

The game can be played with both a mouse/keyboard or with a controller. I recommend the controller if you want to have fun.

Only tested with an xbox 360 controller.

Should be described in the tutorial at the start of the game, but there they are nevertheless:

                a-d / left joystick - move horizontally

                space / A button - jump

                right click / X button - attack

                shift / RT trigger - dash

If the character ever gets stuck outside the screen, the unthinkable happened:

*  the generator ran out of rooms to spawn in.

*   now that shouldn't ever happen, but if it does, the only way to make things right is to restart

If the game suddenly exits when you die, my apologies.
